import React from "react"; import { NavLink, Modal, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, Button, FormGroup, Form, Input, InputGroupAddon, InputGroupText, InputGroup, Row, Col, Link } from "reactstrap"; class SigninButton extends React.Component { state = { loginFormModal: false }; toggleModal = state => { this.setState({ [state]: !this.state[state] }); }; render() { let _buttonOrLink; if (this.props.buttonOrLink === "button") { _buttonOrLink = ( ); } else { _buttonOrLink = ( this.toggleModal("loginFormModal")} > {this.props.title} ); } return (
{_buttonOrLink}
this.toggleModal("loginFormModal")} >
